 母(0) 亲(1) 父(2) 感(3) 恩(4)

0x01,0x00,0x7F,0xFC,0x01,0x00,0x09,0x20,0x11,0x10,0x21,0x08,0x45,0x04,0x02,0x00,/*"亲",1*/
/* (16 X 16 , 宋体 )*/
